faculty_overview.tagline: Discover the computing course for you
faculty_overview.description: The Faculty of Computer Science and Information Technology (FSKTM) is committed to developing innovative, critical-thinking, and ethically-minded graduates. Our distinctive approach seamlessly integrates robust academic rigor with practical, industry-relevant skills, including a strong emphasis on Technical and Vocational Education and Training (TVET) principles. Through a curriculum that deeply integrates robust digital knowledge, problem-solving abilities, and cutting-edge technical expertise with essential soft skills, FSKTM students are empowered to design the future. This unique advantage ensures our graduates are highly adaptable, capable of leading digital transformation, and fully prepared to excel in and meet the dynamic demands of the global technology landscape.

contact_info.address: 86400 Parit Raja, Batu Pahat, Johor, Malaysia

vision_mission_data.vision: To be a global technical university in sustainable technology and transportation.
vision_mission_data.mission: Provide technical solution for industry and community based on tauhidic paradigm.
vision_mission_data.education_philosophy: UTHM education and training, founded on the tauhidic paradigm, strive to produce competent, professional and entrepreneurial graduates, driven by advanced technologies for global development.
vision_mission_data.direction: UTHM as a Global Technopreneur University 2030 (#GTU2030).

establishment_history: September 2000: The faculty began as the Department of Information Technology and Multimedia (JTMM), part of the Faculty of Engineering Technology at Kolej Universiti Tun Hussein Onn (KUiTTHO).
May 2004: JTMM was elevated to the Faculty of Information Technology and Multimedia (FTMM), operating at the Parit Raja City Campus in Batu Pahat, Johor.
August 24, 2010: The faculty was rebranded to its current name, the Faculty of Computer Science and Information Technology (FSKTM).
current_departments: Department of Information Security and Web Technology
background_data.faculty_goal: The faculty's goal is to provide programmes and conduct research that support the vision and mission of the university and meet the needs of the nation. It aims to produce skilled professionals in various fields of computer science and information technology to serve both local and international industries.
